Development Tools

Configuration Management

  • Git-SVN
  • Continuous Integration/Testing
  • Change Management

Git

Use Cases for Kuali

  • Development on SVN-managed project
  • GitHub

Git

versus SVN

  • Distributed so works well with remote groups
  • Local branching, so doesn't effect a remote branch (distributed)
  • No single god repository
  • Being distributed means a remote SVN repository is just as good as a remote Git repository

Continuous Integration/Testing

Tools

  • Jenkins
  • Selenium

Continuous Integration/Testing

Jenkins

  • Building
  • Packaging
  • Distributing
  • Deploying

Jenkins

Rice Use Case: Building

  • Verifies creating of artifacts
  • Not just for compiling code
  • Good to do continously

Jenkins

Rice Use Case: Testing

  • Unit Testing
  • Integration Testing: Selenium

Jenkins

Rice Use Case: Packaging

  • Builds artifacts
  • Saves and stores artifacts for distribution

Jenkins

Rice Use Case: Distributing

  • Readies archives for distribution

Jenkins

Rice Use Case: Deploying

  • For installing the artifacts
  • Not recommended to build on installation machine

Continuous Integration/Testing

Selenium

  • Firefox IDE
  • Converts to different formats to run at testing

Database Change Management

Liquibase

Liquibase is a tool to provides a view of your database (DDL and DML) in terms of changes instead of state. Normally, the only view you can get is what your database looks like per version. Liquibase allows you to see, control, manage, and distribute your database from a versioned perspective. Database changes themselves become coupled with code changes that they impact.
